item.title: New York Republican floats higher tax rate to pay for SALT
item.description: “The One Big Beautiful Bill has stalled — and it needs wind in its sails,” New York Representative Nick LaLota posted Saturday on X.

item.title: US says no decision yet on whether to drop Boeing criminal case
item.description: The long-running criminal proceedings are tied to Boeing 737 Max crashes in 2018 and 2019.

item.title: AI chips are the new ‘coin of the realm’ as they grease the wheels of geopolitical negotiations, BofA says
item.description: Analysts cited the "Important role played by AI chips as part of geopolitical negotiations around trade/tariffs (GPU as the new 'coin of the realm')."

item.title: ‘A big missing part of the story’ — Rust Belt vs. Sun Belt in the battle for U.S. manufacturing jobs
item.description: "The Rust Belt’s manufacturing decline isn’t primarily about jobs going to Mexico. It’s about jobs going to Alabama, South Carolina, Georgia and Tenne...

item.title: Asking rents have fallen nearly 5% since 2022, but prices could start rebounding soon, Redfin says
item.description: Just 47% of newly built apartments were occupied three months after completion, tied for the lowest level on record.
